## Synchronize IMCR software metadata with corresponding repository metadata (e.g. CRAN, PyPI, GitHub)

Software name, category keywords, and a URL to the software in an accepted repository is required ([see instructions](http://wiki.esipfed.org/index.php/Best_practices#IMCR_.28new.29)).
```
# Load the toolkit
library(toolkit)

# Get all IMCR metadata (in JSON format).
get_imcr_json()

# Synchronize the metadata of one package
sync_software_metadata(name = "antiword")

...

# Login to the IMCR with credentials allowing modification of target software.
# Administrator accounts have access to all software metadata.
login()

# Upload metadata to the IMCR of all software whose keywords have been modified.
put_software_category()

# Logout
logout()
```
